name: getFips
description: Returns the current status of FIPS on the specified cluster. When the status is true, FIPS is enabled.

id.description: ID of the Rubrik cluster or *me* for self.

$ul: **isEnabledInFlight**: Boolean that specifies whether FIPS mode is enabled for in-flight encryption. When this value is true, FIPS mode is enabled for in-flight data encryption.
